issue.title: [CF 1213] [Beta] Failure to call method 'CloseDropdownMenus'
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Go to the configuration of any icon 2. Notifications - Add Notification... - Animation - While Condition Set Passing 3. Right click the created notification 4. Either click Clone or any trigger from Change Trigger

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? v8.0.0 r85 (g5bcf9c1)

Do you have an error log of what happened?

``` 5x ...Ons\TellMeWhen\Components\Core\IconEvents\config.lua:639: attempt to call method 'CloseDropdownMenus' (a nil value) ```

Please provide any additional information below. It looks like a typo in the function name, which should be CloseDropDownMenus.


> Posted by CurseForge user neoxz04 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1213 | Raw
